name: Thermalar Factory
description:
You are the guardian robot of a nuclear factory, there is an Elemental Ant Invasion and you have to maintain the Nuclear Reactor at its operational temperature.

Controls:

Directional keys for moving.

Z for shooting your elemental attack.

X for alternate your elemental form.

There is partial controller support.

Collect the gear to get double elemental power for a limited time.

The reactor will heat over time and will stop working if it's too hot or too cold.

Fire ants are inmune to fire and ice ants inmune to ice.

Read the instructions inside the game for further information.
